code: @Test public void testErrorHandler() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     MyErrorBean bean = context.getRegistry().lookupByNameAndType("errorBean", MyErrorBean.class).     assertNotNull(bean).     // 1 regular and 3 redeliveries     assertEquals(3 + 1, bean.getCounter()). }
